name: places/ChIJ4w-SvCD2wokRT70xI-xRSCI
formattedAddress: 372 Central Park W, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 372 Central Park W, New York, NY 10025-8202, USA

originalText.text: I truly don’t even know what words to use to describe Dr.Mamdani. He’s been my doctor for both my pregnancies and I can honestly say, I am so blessed for all his kindness and help. He is so caring and so compassionate. Your needs and your best interest is his priority. His whole staff makes you feel so welcomed and cared for. I would always look forward to my appointments. He is an exceptional doctor and you would be lucky to have him in your life for all your gynecology needs. The best of the best.

originalText.text: One of the most compassionate, caring doctors. He is patient and very thorough. Highly recommend.

text.text: One of the most compassionate, caring doctors. He is patient and very thorough. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Dr Mamdani is simply terrific! Kind, caring, warm, knowledgeable & explains everything to you patiently & clearly. It’s a joy to deal with him and I recommend him as the best OBGYN I have ever used! Staff is also excellent!

text.text: Dr Mamdani is simply terrific! Kind, caring, warm, knowledgeable & explains everything to you patiently & clearly. It’s a joy to deal with him and I recommend him as the best OBGYN I have ever used! Staff is also excellent!

originalText.text: Awesome Doctor, He delivered my first born 19 year ago when I was very young and scared and he always made me feel comfortable, then my 5 year old and now my next to come. I have trust in him always and will continue  to have him as my doctor. His nurses and staff are wonderful very friendly.

text.text: Awesome Doctor, He delivered my first born 19 year ago when I was very young and scared and he always made me feel comfortable, then my 5 year old and now my next to come. I have trust in him always and will continue  to have him as my doctor. His nurses and staff are wonderful very friendly.

originalText.text: If I could give a one star I would! The staff is the absolute worst! The doctor himself will not explain anything to you. I guess he just expects for you not to ask any questions and if you do, he'll just brush it off. Don't get me wrong he is a nice guy, but I want to know what is going on with my body and baby. I want a doctor that will walk me through the process. After meeting with him a couple of times, I decided to interview a couple more doctors. I was told by his staff that if I saw another doctor I was not welcomed back... I don't know if that's the direction from the doctor or if his staff makes these executive decisions. I also needed a second copy of my blood work and results that I paid for and they are giving me a hard time and basically saying "we already gave you a copy once and we no longer have your file or someone will call you later"... I asked when should I expect a call back and they simply said "I don't know" Don't waste your time!
